e: ￹`Aka~ `saka~`saken~ `ko~ `riko'~.￺Don't trample on the clothes.￻不要踐踏衣服
￹`Aka~ `pi~`sakasak~ `to~ `sowal~ `no~ `ma~`to'as~`ay~.￺Don't be disrespectful of the words of the elders.￻對老人家的訓勉不得無禮，不要藐視大人的叮嚀
d.f: ￹￺to trample on * as grain sown * plants growing * or something lying on the path * figuratively￻踐踏，蹂躝；如踩踏已撒好的穀子, 萌芽的植物或散落在路上的東西；比喻上的意義
